I just build things and pretend they are other things. If I want a life support module, I will build one out of spar parts and hope it works. Only a few Kerbals die in the process of my madness. No biggie!

What I do is make a few hitchhiker containers attached for kerbals to live in, A power plant that's covered with solar panels on top and batteries beneath. A radio tower for communication and lights all around it, Make it tall. A landing pad if your good at landing. A garage type thing for rovers. A fuel depot for fuel. A "Escape pod" For emergency escape. Also make a space station. That's all I can think of.

Here's something to get you started.

I've got a ground shuttle to take kerbals between locations, as I spread things 2.5 Km to avoid lag, a big crane for moving stuff, (carried those habitation modules to the site), and I'm planning exploration vehicles, for trips to places on the Mun I haven't been yet. I've got a few return rockets, that hold nine, on standby in case of emergency.

Also, testing a space barbecue. For parties, and special events.
